3569.verse: وَمَا|And not|72|86|46$كَانَ|(it) is|57|86|913$لِمُؤْمِنٍ|for a believing man|145|174|4307$وَلَا|and not|71|100|25$مُؤْمِنَةٍ|(for) a believing woman,|181|210|14051$إِذَا|when|55|69|1370$قَضَى ٱللَّهُ|Allah has decided|135|146|14052$وَرَسُولُهُۥٓ|and His Messenger|143|165|5068$أَمْرًا|a matter|77|99|1085$أَن|that|48|70|655$يَكُونَ|(there) should be|135|157|1335$لَهُمُ|for them|76|87|1027$ٱلْخِيَرَةُ|(any) choice|104|112|13513$مِنْ|about|58|73|53$أَمْرِهِمْۗ|their affair.|94|109|10689$وَمَن|And whoever|106|121|1012$يَعْصِ|disobeys|77|92|3794$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|68|1809$وَرَسُولَهُۥ|and His Messenger|143|150|3790$فَقَدْ|certainly,|82|133|1016$ضَلَّ|he (has) strayed|131|233|1017$ضَلَـٰلاً|(into) error|93|195|4118$مُّبِينًا|clear.|64|115|3849$

3570.verse: وَإِذْ|And when|85|92|308$تَقُولُ|you said|75|88|3239$لِلَّذِىٓ|to the one,|95|108|5762$أَنْعَمَ ٱللَّهُ|Allah bestowed favor|159|172|4162$عَلَيْهِ|on him|64|77|395$وَأَنْعَمْتَ|and you bestowed favor|181|188|14053$عَلَيْهِ|on him,|68|78|395$أَمْسِكْ|`Keep|76|96|14054$عَلَيْكَ|to yourself|91|111|2245$زَوْجَكَ|your wife|86|106|14055$وَٱتَّقِ|and fear|75|95|14056$ٱللَّهَ|Allah.`|64|84|1809$وَتُخْفِى|But you concealed|143|153|14057$فِى|within|59|71|89$نَفْسِكَ|yourself|72|97|4227$مَا|what|53|78|262$ٱللَّهُ|Allah|53|78|123$مُبْدِيهِ|(was to) disclose.|139|164|14058$وَتَخْشَى|And you fear|105|130|14059$ٱلنَّاسَ|the people,|95|107|446$وَٱللَّهُ|while Allah|89|97|167$أَحَقُّ|has more right|115|132|1994$أَن|that|48|64|655$تَخْشَـٰهُۖ|you (should) fear Him.|167|184|14060$فَلَمَّا|So when|77|94|141$قَضَىٰ|ended|75|92|1084$زَيْدٌ|Zaid|55|63|14061$مِّنْهَا|from her|75|87|246$وَطَرًا|necessary (formalities),|176|200|14062$زَوَّجْنَـٰكَهَا|We married her to you|168|192|14063$لِكَىْ|so that|68|92|10045$لَا|not|42|66|30$يَكُونَ|there be|76|88|1335$عَلَى|on|63|72|52$ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ|the believers|107|124|1964$حَرَجٌ|any discomfort|118|135|6242$فِىٓ|concerning|92|109|89$أَزْوَٲجِ|the wives|84|101|14064$أَدْعِيَآئِهِمْ|(of) their adopted sons|174|183|14065$إِذَا|when|55|63|1370$قَضَوْاْ|they have ended|132|148|14066$مِنْهُنَّ|from them|87|103|3891$وَطَرًاۚ|necessary (formalities).|176|192|14062$وَكَانَ|And is|71|87|363$أَمْرُ|(the) Command|122|130|8630$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah|81|322|606$مَفْعُولاً|accomplished.|113|354|4060$

3571.verse: مَّا|Not|43|59|262$كَانَ|(there can) be|117|150|913$عَلَى|upon|63|96|52$ٱلنَّبِىِّ|the Prophet|98|131|7946$مِنْ|any|50|83|53$حَرَجٍ|discomfort|89|122|4779$فِيمَا|in what|69|85|1058$فَرَضَ ٱللَّهُ|Allah has imposed|137|149|14067$لَهُۖۥ|on him.|68|92|977$سُنَّةَ|(That is the) Way|139|163|10483$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah|81|105|606$فِى|concerning|92|116|89$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|101|20$خَلَوْاْ|passed away|106|124|117$مِن قَبْلُۚ|before.|92|127|250$وَكَانَ|And is|71|106|363$أَمْرُ|(the) Command|122|157|8630$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah|81|116|606$قَدَرًا|a decree|78|96|14068$مَّقْدُورًا|destined.|89|89|14069$

3572.verse: ٱلَّذِينَ|Those who|92|103|20$يُبَلِّغُونَ|convey|87|110|14070$رِسَـٰلَـٰتِ|(the) Messages|123|146|6493$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah|81|104|2$وَيَخْشَوْنَهُۥ|and fear Him|125|148|14071$وَلَا|and (do) not|104|115|25$يَخْشَوْنَ|fear|93|103|4206$أَحَدًا|anyone|68|88|4849$إِلَّا|except|65|85|86$ٱللَّهَۗ|Allah.|56|76|184$وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ|And sufficient is Allah|162|182|3709$حَسِيبًا|(as) a Reckoner.|130|140|3710$

3576.verse: هُوَ|He|48|73|298$ٱلَّذِى|(is) the One Who|134|184|138$يُصَلِّى|sends His blessings|146|196|2824$عَلَيْكُمْ|upon you|81|131|416$وَمَلَـٰٓئِكَتُهُۥ|and His Angels|117|142|14075$لِيُخْرِجَكُم|so that He may bring you out|215|226|14076$مِّنَ|from|50|73|156$ٱلظُّلُمَـٰتِ|the darkness[es]|132|155|2296$إِلَى|to|53|76|118$ٱلنُّورِۚ|the light.|80|103|2297$وَكَانَ|And He is|82|93|363$بِٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ|to the believers|124|359|4986$رَحِيمًا|Merciful.|81|316|3814$

3569.verse: It is not for a believing man or a believing woman, when Allah and His Messenger have decided a matter, that they should [thereafter] have any choice about their affair. And whoever disobeys Allah and His Messenger has certainly strayed into clear error.

3570.verse: And [remember, O Muhammad], when you said to the one on whom Allah bestowed favor and you bestowed favor, "Keep your wife and fear Allah," while you concealed within yourself that which Allah is to disclose. And you feared the people, while Allah has more right that you fear Him. So when Zayd had no longer any need for her, We married her to you in order that there not be upon the believers any discomfort concerning the wives of their adopted sons when they no longer have need of them. And ever is the command of Allah accomplished.

3571.verse: There is not to be upon the Prophet any discomfort concerning that which Allah has imposed upon him. [This is] the established way of Allah with those [prophets] who have passed on before. And ever is the command of Allah a destiny decreed.

3572.verse: [Allah praises] those who convey the messages of Allah and fear Him and do not fear anyone but Allah. And sufficient is Allah as Accountant.

3573.verse: Muhammad is not the father of [any] one of your men, but [he is] the Messenger of Allah and last of the prophets. And ever is Allah, of all things, Knowing.

3574.verse: O you who have believed, remember Allah with much remembrance

3575.verse: And exalt Him morning and afternoon.

3576.verse: It is He who confers blessing upon you, and His angels [ask Him to do so] that He may bring you out from darknesses into the light. And ever is He, to the believers, Merciful.
